类 HashProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • orestes.bloomfilter.HashProvider

  • public class HashProvider
extends java.lang.Object

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  HashProvider.HashFunction
      An interface which can be implemented to provide custom hash functions.
      static class  HashProvider.HashMethod
      Different types of hash functions that can be used.

      • rejectionSample

        public static int rejectionSample(int random,
                                  int m)
        Performs rejection sampling on a random 32bit Java int (sampled from Integer.MIN_VALUE to Integer.MAX_VALUE).
        参数:
        random - int
        返回:
        the number down-sampled to interval [0, size]. Or -1 if it has to be rejected.
